actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for station license renewal by the Federal Communications Commission.

summary.text: Prohibits the Federal Communications Commission from denying an applicant renewal of a station license, due to a violation of FCC rules regarding billing practices, without determining whether the directors of such station were directly involved in violating such rules and without considering the value of the applicant's programming services.

titles.title: A bill to provide for station license renewal by the Federal Communications Commission.
